import React from 'react'; import aboutImage from '../assets/about.jpg'; // Ensure you have an appropriate image at this path function AboutUsSection() { return (
{/* Our Mission and Our Team - Stacked on top of each other on the left */}

Our Mission

At GRAMPS of Tennessee, our core commitment is health and happiness through knowledge. Knowledge is power, therefore, it is our mission to educate and inform our local community about all things related to aging!

Our Team

Behind every service at GRAMPS of Tennessee is a team of dedicated professionals. Each member brings expertise and empathy to their role, working tirelessly to create meaningful experiences for our seniors.

{/* What does GRAMPS Mean? - Centered in the middle */}

What does GRAMPS Mean?

Geriatric
Resources
Advising
Moving
Placement
Services
of Tennessee
{/* About Image - On the right */}
); } export default AboutUsSection;
